index.headline: Pay once and <Styled>split</Styled> between the <Styled>rest</Styled> of the group
index.tagLine: Easily split expenses with friends, family, or colleagues. Using Split.rest, one person pays, and the rest of the group settles up — simple, fair, and hassle-free.
index.mockLightMode: Available in bright colors if you are not the dead inside type
index.mockSplit: Easily view the details of each split, including edit history!
index.mockSplitTypes: Multiple split types to choose from
index.mockRoulette: Never be in doubt who should pay next with the roulette (it's fair, we promise)
index.mockSettleUp: Settle up with a single click. Well, two actually, but who's counting?
index.mockBig: Works great on both small and big screens

splitType.selectType: How would you like to split?

splitTypeDescription.exactAmounts: Select the participants, choose who paid, and enter how much each person owes.
splitTypeDescription.equalAmounts: Select the participants, choose who paid, and decide whether to split a total amount equally or prefill a specific value for each person. You can adjust the amounts manually at the end.
splitTypeDescription.balanceChanges: Select the participants and specify how their balances changed. This type allows multiple people to have negative balances simultaneously, as long as the total sums to zero — perfect for poker games!
